src.description: Module to use to generate the environment variable

dotenvConfigOptions.description: This is a DotenvConfigOption based on package @types/dotenv

model.description: The model used as environment check. Typically named Environment

modelPath.description: This is the path of the model for the environment. Typically app/environments/model

template.description: This is the template file to use to render the environment.

templateVariables.description: These are custom variables that can be used in the template.
